title: Apple Signals CEO Candidate by Expanding Hardware Boss’s Role
description: Apple has expanded the job of hardware chief John Ternus to include design work, a move solidifying his status as a leading contender to eventually succeed current Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook. Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman discusses the move with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)
